parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands related entities (navigation properties) inline. For example, setting $expand to "CreatedByUser", if the model has a property called CreatedByUser, will allow the results to include the User model for the CreatedByUser property.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition. Operator examples include "eq" for "equals", "ne" for "does not equal", "gt" and "lt" for "greater than"/"less than", "contains('foo')", "endswith('bar')", etc. See querystring examples.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the response. For example, if the model has a nested property of CreatedByUser, and $select is set to "CreatedByUser", then the response will only include the CreatedByUser model.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Sorts the results. For example, setting $orderby to "LastName,FirstName" will sort the results by LastName then FirstName.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Returns only the first n results.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Skips the first n results.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Includes a count of the matching results (property "@odata.count") in the response.
